modName: UNP Female Dragon and Star Tattoo Texture

descriptionHtml:
[center][heading][b] The Dragon And The Stars Tattoo Texture for UNP [/b] [/heading][/center]

The Ningheim Race compatibility coming very soon as in later tonight and yes this is not just for dark elf it works for all races except khajit and argonian

[center][img] http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/45649-1-1382870525.png [/img][/center]

[center][heading][b] Description [/b][/heading][/center]
Warning this does include the UNP nude texture!

Sick of overdone, cheesy, Silly, over the top sexual and all other manner of custom tattoo textures?!  
WELL here\'s my custom tattoo texture that i use with DIMONIZED UNP Base Body.  It should work just fine for other UNP body variants as well!  Its Simplistic and not overcrowded like so many, yet it still has lots of body coverage.  It flows smoothly; treating the body like a canvass as opposed to just stamping tattoos in random areas.  It is sexy but not overly sexualized like so many mods here on the nexus.

I hope you Enjoy!

[center][heading][b] Download and Installation [/b][/heading][/center]
[b][u]First we need to download all required files which include UNP and my new texture![/u][/b]

[b] [1] [/b] Download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?] Dimonized UNP Female Body[/url] 
[b] [2] [/b] Download my mod with NMM or manually

[b][u] Next we backup our original texture so if we want to delete the mod later we still have it[/u][/b]

[b] [3] [/b] Go into your Skyrim install directory usually (Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim) from there navigate to (Data\\Textures\\Actors\\Character\\Female) and fine the file called (Femalebody_1.dds) rename that file to something like (Femalebody_1BAK.dds) or whatever you will remember later on!

[b][u] Lastly we install the mod and overwright when necissary [/u][/b]

[b] [4] [/b] Double Click in Nexus Mod Manager and say yes to overwright

[b]......OR MANUALLY......[/b]

[b] [4] [/b] Unrar the rar file and drag the data folder into:
(Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim)
and over wright any files!

[b] [5] [/b] DONE! ENJOY!

[center][heading][b] Recommended Mods [/b][/heading]
I highly recommend ALL these mods for those who don\'t already have them.  I use 254 mods which is the limit so i have to pick and choose. These are just a handful of mods that Stand out the most to me in my collection as must have mods!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?] Dimonized UNP Female Body[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29408/?] Female animations pack [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273/?] Ethereal Elven Overhaul [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563/?] Coverwomen [/url] 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?] Apachii Skyhair [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781//?] Project ENB [/url]
(My ENB is a heavily modified version of project ENB that I personally tweeked and am not releasing)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450/?] Realistic Lighting Overhaul [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/?] Climates of Tamriel [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8429/?] Interesting NPCs [/url]

[url=https://sites.google.com/site/skyrimsurvivorseries/frostfall] Frostfall Survival [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639/?] Imps more complex needs [/url]

[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/mods/skyrim/] Dungeon Explorer set (armor in screens) [/url][/center]

[center][heading][b] Uninstall [/b][/heading][/center]
Delete the texture Femalebody_1.dds from (Data\\Textures\\Actors\\Character\\Female) and restore your backed up texture if available.  Alternatively just reinstall the unp base body to get your old texture back!

Please enjoy and let me know if you want some modified versions with less or more stars or certain things omitted or added and i will see what i can do!

[b]Cheers![/b]
author: Demonik
